ygData.subject: Re: NEAT Libraries?
ygData.msgSnippet: There is no point to save a network since it s just the phenotype of the genome, it is constructed by it. The organism is the genotype and phenotype together,

There is no point to save a network since it's just the phenotype of 
the g=
enome, it is constructed by it. The organism is the genotype and 
phenotype=
 together, you need just the genome to create one. 
To save species.. hm.. =
Just save every genome in your population.. 
You can save the compatibility=
 threshold, too. The population will be 
speciated automatically when it is=
 loaded. 
Therefore, everything is OK. :) 

Peter

--- In neat@yahoogroups.=
com, "Chris Spencer" <chrisspen@...> wrote:

There seems

iting genomes to a file, but nothing for 
saving or

ecies, or networks. Do you have any 
suggestions or
